Length	139
Function	Binds beta-galactoside and lactose. Strong inducer of T-cell apoptosis (PubMed:10527825, PubMed:19497882). Has hemagglutinating activity towards chicken erythrocytes (PubMed:29343868).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Nucleus matrix
